SELECT * FROM ( SELECT S.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT SIT_BACKUP_ID, REG_DATE, SIT_REG_ID, NAME , ROAD_ADDR, DETAILED_ADDR, ZIP_CODE, TEL, FILE_PATH FROM ADMIN_SIT_REG_VIEW WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY SIT_BACKUP_ID DESC ) S ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ADMIN_SIT_REG_VIEW WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT B.SIT_BACKUP_ID AS SIT_BACKUP_ID , B.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE , R.SIT_REG_ID AS SIT_REG_ID , R.PW AS PW , R.NAME AS NAME , R.SSN_FIRST AS SSN_FIRST , R.SSN_SECOND AS SSN_SECOND , R.ROAD_ADDR AS ROAD_ADDR , R.DETAILED_ADDR AS DETAILED_ADDR , TO_CHAR(R.ZIP_CODE) AS ZIP_CODE , R.TEL AS TEL , R.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH FROM SIT_REG R JOIN SIT_BACKUP B ON R.SIT_BACKUP_ID = B.SIT_BACKUP_ID WHERE R.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT S.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT * FROM V_ADMIN_SIT_ALL WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY SIT_BACKUP_ID DESC ) S ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM V_ADMIN_SIT_ALL WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIT_BACKUP(SIT_BACKUP_ID, REG_DATE, ID) VALUES(#{sit_backup_id}, #{reg_date}, #{id})

INSERT INTO SIT_CHK(SIT_CHK_ID, SIT_BACKUP_ID, CHK_DATE) VALUES('SCHK' || LPAD(SEQ_SCHK.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{sit_backup_id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT SIT_BACKUP_ID, REG_DATE, ID, PW, NAME , SIT_CHK_ID, CHK_DATE, SSN_FIRST , SSN_SECOND, ROAD_ADDR, DETAILED_ADDR , ZIP_CODE, TEL, BANK_TYPE, ACCT_NUMBER FROM SIT_VIEW WHERE NAME LIKE '%#{name}%'

SELECT R.SIT_REG_ID, R.SIT_BACKUP_ID, B.ID, R.PW, R.NAME, R.SSN_FIRST, R.SSN_SECOND, R.ROAD_ADDR, R.DETAILED_ADDR, R.ZIP_CODE, R.TEL, R.FILE_PATH FROM SIT_REG R JOIN SIT_BACKUP B ON B.SIT_BACKUP_ID = R.SIT_BACKUP_ID WHERE ID = #{id} AND PW = #{pw}
SELECT SIT_REG_ID, SIT_BACKUP_ID, ID, PW, REG_DATE, NAME, SSN_FIRST, SSN_SECOND , ROAD_ADDR, DETAILED_ADDR, ZIP_CODE, TEL , BANK_TYPE, ACCT_NUMBER FROM SIT_VIEW WHERE SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id}
SELECT MIN_RANGE FROM GRADES WHERE GRADE_ID = ( SELECT LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(GRADE_ID)+1), 3, '0') FROM GRADES WHERE NAME = #{grade} )

SELECT AVG(GREV.RATING) AS RATING FROM GEN_REVIEWS GREV, GEN_CONFIRMED GCON, GEN_REQ GREQ, GEN_REG GREG, SIT_BACKUP SBAC WHERE GREV.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = GCON.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID AND GCON.GEN_REQ_ID = GREQ.GEN_REQ_ID AND GREQ.GEN_REG_ID = GREG.GEN_REG_ID AND GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id}

SELECT AVG(GREV.RATING) AS TOTALRATING FROM GEN_REVIEWS GREV, GEN_CONFIRMED GCON, GEN_REQ GREQ, GEN_REG GREG, SIT_BACKUP SBAC WHERE GREV.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = GCON.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID AND GCON.GEN_REQ_ID = GREQ.GEN_REQ_ID AND GREQ.GEN_REG_ID = GREG.GEN_REG_ID AND GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id} GROUP BY GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID

SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(GREV.RATING), 1), 0) AS MONTH3RATING FROM GEN_REVIEWS GREV, GEN_CONFIRMED GCON, GEN_REQ GREQ, GEN_REG GREG, SIT_BACKUP SBAC WHERE GREV.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = GCON.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID AND GCON.GEN_REQ_ID = GREQ.GEN_REQ_ID AND GREQ.GEN_REG_ID = GREG.GEN_REG_ID AND GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id} AND GREV.REVIEWED_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM GEN_REG GREG, GEN_REQ GREQ, GEN_CONFIRMED GCON , CHILD_BACKUP CBAC, CHILD_REG CREG, PAR_BACKUP PBAC, PAR_REG PREG , GEN_PAR_CONFIRMED_CANCELED GPCC, GEN_SIT_CONFIRMED_CANCELED GSCC WHERE GREG.GEN_REG_ID = GREQ.GEN_REG_ID AND GREQ.GEN_REQ_ID = GCON.GEN_REQ_ID AND GREQ.CHILD_BACKUP_ID = CBAC.CHILD_BACKUP_ID AND CBAC.CHILD_BACKUP_ID = CREG.CHILD_BACKUP_ID AND CBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID = PBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID AND PBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID = PREG.PAR_BACKUP_ID AND GCON.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = GPCC.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID(+) AND GCON.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID = GSCC.GEN_CONFIRMED_ID(+) AND GPCC.GEN_PAR_CONFIRMED_CANCELED_ID IS NULL AND GSCC.GEN_SIT_CONFIRMED_CANCELED_ID IS NULL AND GREQ.END_DATE < SYSDATE AND GREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id} ORDER BY GREQ.END_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM SIT_BACKUP SBAC, CHILD_BACKUP CBAC, CHILD_REG CREG , PAR_BACKUP PBAC, PAR_REG PREG, EMG_REQ EREQ , EMG_CONFIRMED ECON, EMG_PAY_REC EPAY, EMG_CANCELED ECAN WHERE CBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID = PBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID AND CBAC.CHILD_BACKUP_ID = CREG.CHILD_BACKUP_ID AND PBAC.PAR_BACKUP_ID = PREG.PAR_BACKUP_ID AND EREQ.CHILD_BACKUP_ID = CBAC.CHILD_BACKUP_ID AND ECON.EMG_REQ_ID = EREQ.EMG_REQ_ID AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = ECON.SIT_BACKUP_ID AND EREQ.EMG_REQ_ID = EPAY.EMG_REQ_ID AND EPAY.EMG_PAY_REC_ID = ECAN.EMG_PAY_REC_ID(+) AND ECAN.EMG_PAY_REC_ID IS NULL AND EREQ.END_DATE < SYSDATE AND SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id} ORDER BY EREQ.END_DATE DESC
